TopicTitle: Display Science Earnt During Flight via Mission Control

Articles.Content:
Suggestion - Display Science Earnt During Flight via Mission Control

Pretty simple idea really, when viewing your current flights in progress via the mission control / satellite array screen, have a display similar to MET, possibly below it in blue; Informing the player of how much science the mission has so far achieved / how much will be rewarded on recovery.

Seem's like a small suggestion, but one that I feel would definitely give positive feedback to the player about how there missions are going before recovery.
